item.title: Wait button not working on post 5., 2nd February
item.description:

item.title: About 9 very deep very large potholes and one in particular is incredibly deep and right in the middle of the road, 2nd February
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 65, Severn Road, Lynworth, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Sunken chamber cover-outside Hedgerows GL51 6RL, 2nd February
item.description:
Outside Hedgerows in main carriageway: Your team arrived to carryout this task w/c 26th Jan 2026, But unfortunately they were unable to remove the cast iron cover from the frame. Therefore they laid some temporary tarmac over the sunken cover . This now requires a return visit with the required tools to remove the cover & frame and possibly replace with a new one if the current cover is not repairable. Many Thanks to your team for their effort on the day. Steel inspection/drain cover located in the highway adjacent to Property ‘Hedgerows’ rattles/bangs as traffic drives over. I have a drain in lower floor of my Property ’Windermere’ on the opposite side of the road. when traffic travel over the said chamber cover I get a noise/knocking sound in our property. I can hear this throughout the ground floor and is now causing a nuisance. My tel 07788567901. Many thanks
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): The Reddings, Hatherley, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
